comment.author: 29232197@N02
comment._content: This is in reality a photo Nobbys Beach and taken from Nobbys headland just below(or at) the signal station/lighthouse. It is interesting to note the old railway on the beach. This was used to construct the breakwater between Nobbys beach and the (then) Nobbys island. Incidentally, Newcastle beach is approx. 1 km over the hill (Fort Scratchly)  in the upper left of the photko.
